author: Alec Fernandez
comment: This game is one of the only few I personally enjoy and is Google Recommend. I can play this game for hours on end trying to test my self to next levels of difficulty. I do realize there has been complaints about it being to hard to play or not being "smooth" That is just my Moto 360 on how small it is. It does run smooth though. This app is a fun app, AQ. Please consider making more games for Android Wear
title: Only Few!

author: Marc Gamet
comment: On Moto 360, bottom row of board is cut off, but computer can still place pieces there. The pieces on the bottom are fully visible. So it seems the board is not scalled correctly for the 8x8 board. Double tap to zoom in mostly works. Cool this works on the watch but would rather play on my Note 3. ;-)
title: It's fun, but too hard to play on small screen

author: Eric Goble
comment: Gameplay is great, however it seems to run as a layer over the watch face, which I have shortcuts on. So trying to play the game is triggering the shortcuts instead of laying a game piece. Of course if I switch to a watchface without shortcuts it's fine. Will update review if this can be fixed to play without switching my watchface.

author: Gary Peters
comment: Great work! Looks and runs pretty nice on my square LG watch screen. Not sure what it'd be like on a round one though. But I'm not sure if this app is causing android wear to crash or not. Been seeing that problem lately. And from time to time, I notice this app is up and running. A potential problem because it keeps the watch awake. Also when it does, it has a mostly filled in screen somehow. But I foo like it.

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Thanks Gary, I am going to investigate that potential issue, and fix it!

title: Like the Game

author: Drew Derbyshire
comment: Selecting options is hard ...  especially setting difficulty doesn't seem to work properly. Once playing, double tap to zoom is unreliable, and it is easy to tap the wrong spot with no undo.
title: Too hard to play on moto 360

author: Oleksii Kropachov
comment: Last row is cutted. Items are too small. Screen sometimes may be switched off, when I'm thinking. Seekbar doesn't work at all.

reply.author: AQ
reply.content: Thanks, going to investigate that. For the "too small items", you can double-tap where you want to zoom. For the last row being cut, I am wondering if you are not hitting the famous/known Android Wear bug of round display (a crazy issue related to language which I cannot fix since it's in Wear) but in this case, not only the last row would be cut.

title: Moto360

author: Letty Margeson
comment: First off, no permissions?  I effing love that.  Second, the program looks wonderful. It's simple to navigate and the controls are great. It's very fun! No bugs either.  Definite 5 stars from me.
title: Fantastic!

author: SIMCHA ADLER
comment: It Does not open. I know its a great game. I grew up on it Please fix I WILL give it a 5 STAR. SORRY
title: Sorry

author: Alex Leung
comment: Good customization options available, even comes with 0 players mode. AI is too weak though.
title: Good game, weak AI

author: George Nixon
comment: You use any other app, such as a mini launcher or Coffee, that has a hotspot on the screen to launch it.
title: Doesn't work if..

author: Chris Benson
comment: On my LG G Watch it won't let me close the app, so I'm uninstalling, but I'm sad because it's a really nice application.
title: Can't close app?

author: Ninjajack95
comment: It isn't letting me open. Is this a problem with  galaxy s2?

reply.author: AQ
reply.content:
Hi Jack, this game is for Android Wear (see description and screenshots), do you have a watch?
If you have an Android Wear device, try to "Resync apps" or uninstall and then re-install it again, and be sure to have enough free space on your watch. Please change your ratings or remove your comment if you think you made a mistake. Thank you.

title: Doesn't working

comment: Can zoom in which helps game play usability on these small devices.
title: Fun

comment: I can tell it sucks before I even play it

author: Angelina Walton
comment: The game gets stuck on my watch window and I cannot get out. There's no cancel or stop to option out of the game. Had to uninstall.
title: I liked the app on my watch but, I can not get out of it.

author: Zahir Merchant
comment: The app took out a quarter of my battery just by me opening it once and then going back to my watch face. Can't seem to close once inactive.
title: Good execution, awful battery suck

comment: Killed the battery on my Moto 360. As well as not during the screen.

comment: Its a useless app... After installing...it doesnt even show in my phone.!!

author: Sergey Snegirev
comment: It keeps launching itself on my phone and there's no way to exit it.
title: Cannot exit

author: Charlotte Lyons
comment: Not Great on Moto 360

author: PRATHNA SOTH
comment: Kamboider Sambo sam ba

author: Casen
comment: How do you play revirsi ?

author: Dhayananth Rattaipalivalasu Saravanan
comment: Superb game in wear... But sliding left doesn't close the game

reply.author: AQ
reply.content:
Like many Android Wear apps, you just have to "long press" the screen to quit. You can also cover the screen with your palm.
"This may be common in apps that are used for a longer while. In all cases, you should treat long-press as the user's intent to exit" - Ref: https://developer.android.com/design/wear/structure.html

title: Hard to close the game

comment: Really awesome

comment: Goooooood game
